introduction.title: Hello, I'm Madalin👋
introduction.content: Passionate about computer science, still self-teaching about the topic on the daily. I create stuff during my free time, mostly because I love the power of making something out of nothing. I'm open to any discussion, side project or small talk regarding CS, you can hit me up anytime.

about.title: Who am I? 🙎
about.content: I am 21 years old kid based in Bucharest, fresh out of high school, trying to sustain myself while also pursuing my dream career. The little time that I do not spend sitting in front of a computer, it's spent listening to music, taking walks outside, visit friends and eating a lot 🍗 you can also see me staring into your soul below.
